Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 4; W1: 6; W2: 6; W3: 5; W4: 5; W5: 5; W6: 5; W7: 4; W8: 3; W9: 2 Spell DC: W: 12
Magic Notes:
Greater Elemental Focus (Acid): Increased Elemental Focus (Acid) effects
Intelligence Wizard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level W1, W2
School Specialization (Illusion): Extra Illusion spell/dy each spell level
Spell Focus (Divination): +1 Spell DC (Divination)
Spell Focus (Transmutation): +1 Spell DC (Transmutation)
Arcane Blast: R30' Ranged touch uses spell slot (level 1 minimum) to inflict 2d6 HP + 1d6 HP/slot level
Arcane Shield: May use spell slot to gain +1 AC/slot level for 1 rd
Blinding Ray: R30' Ranged touch blinds or dazzles target for 1 rd 5/dy
Bouncing Spell: May redirect ineffective spell to another target; uses +1 spell slot
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Dazing Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes dazed (spell save or Will neg) for spell level rd; uses +3 spell slot
Disruptive Spell: Target of spell must make concentration check to use spell or spell-like ability for 1 rd; uses +1 spell slot
Diviner's Delving: Gives +2 checks to overcome divination spell resistance; concentration divinations require 1 fewer rd
Ectoplasmic Spell: May cast spell targeting incorporeal or ethereal target; uses +1 spell slot
Elemental Focus (Acid): +2 save DC on spells that inflict acid damage
Elemental Spell (Acid): May convert half or all spell damage to acid damage; uses +1 spell slot
Extended Illusions: Illusion duration increased 8 rd
Focused Spell: One chosen target of a multi-target spell suffers +2 save DC; uses +1 spell slot
Heighten Spell: Increase chosen spell level
Improved Counterspell: Counter using higher-level spell from same school
Intensified Spell: Raises spell damage cap by 5 HD; uses +1 spell slot
Lingering Spell: May cast instantaneous spell w/duration 1 rd; uses +1 spell slot
Major Spell Expertise: May use 1 chosen spell of 5th level or lower as spell-like ability 2/dy
Merciful Spell: May cast spells to inflict nonlethal damage
Minor Spell Expertise: May use 1 chosen spell of 1st level as spell-like ability 2/dy
Parry Spell: Countered spell turns back on caster
Persistent Spell: May force spell target to take worse of 2 saving throws; uses +2 spell slot
Preferred Spell: May cast 1 chosen spell(s) in place of prepared spell
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
School Opposition (Abjuration): Double cost to cast Abjuration spells
School Opposition (Enchantment): Double cost to cast Enchantment spells
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Selective Spell: May protect from damage ability modifier targets in spell effect area; uses +1 spell slot
Sickening Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes sickened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
Spell Perfection: May use metamagic feat for one chosen spell w/out cost; spell gains dbl other feat bonuses
Tenacious Transmutation: Self transmutation spell gains +2 DC to dispel, and effects continue 1 rd after successful dispel
Thundering Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes deafened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
Companions
Familiar: Crab "Nuzgu"
Str: 7 (-2) Dex: 15 (+2) Con: 12 (+1) Int: 14 (+2) Wis: 10 (+0) Cha: 2 (-4) Size: T
HD/HP: 17/34 Init: +2 AC: 27 Attack: +8 2@1d2-2 CMB/CMD: +8/16 Fort/Ref/Will: +6/+7/+10
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Companion Spell Resistance; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Scry On Familiar; Share Spells; Speak With Like Animals; Speak With Master
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: Deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: Share emotions up to 1 mile
Eye For Talent: Animal companion, bonded mount, cohort, or familiar gains +2 on choice of ability
Improved Share Spells: R5' May share non-instantaneous self spells w/companion; halves spell effects duration
Scry On Familiar: Master views companion 1/dy
Share Spells: Master share self spell w/companion w/in 5'
Speak With Like Animals: Talk w/similar creatures
Speak With Master: Talk w/master in secret language
